headline: Old Dominion Freight Line Releases 2024 Sustainability Report
summary: THOMASVILLE, N.C., October 17, 2025--Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (Nasdaq: ODFL) announced today the release of its 2024 Sustainability Report. The 2024 Sustainability Report content has been informed by the Sustainability Accounting Standards Board (SASB) Road Transportation Sustainability Accounting Standard and is reported with reference to the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) standards. Old Dominion received a limited assurance verification opinion for its 2024 Scope 1 and Scope 2 Greenh

The 2024 Sustainability Report content has been informed by the Sustainability Accounting Standards Board (SASB) Road Transportation Sustainability Accounting Standard and is reported with reference to the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) standards. Old Dominion received a limited assurance verification opinion for its 2024 Scope 1 and Scope 2 Greenh
